sections.heading: leave of absence; violation; penalty
sections.text: Any person, firm, or organization violating section 55-160 or 55-161 shall be guilty of a Class IV misdemeanor and, in addition thereto, shall restore to the employee all rights of which he or she has been illegally deprived.SourceLaws 1957, c. 238, ยง 4, p. 799;R
